Posts.Content: Wow thank you all for your replies.  My kids are 4 and 7, and I do normally work full time yeah but work have been brill and just said take how ever long u need and put you first.  So that has been 1 less worry.  Have an app tmw now for mri and chat about potentially doing chemo first so see how that all goes. i think ur advise for just taking each step one at a time and not worrying about the next till I’m there will really help.  Trying to stay positive, it’s good to know it’s beatable and I can do it.  Thank you all xx

Posts.Content: Thank you all so much! It has helped me a lot already just being able to get my thoughts out on here and see others had thought it to! Ha my diagnosis was stage 1 triple negative cancer.  i had an mri and ct scan today which both came back clear! Was such a relief and I feel sooo much better now I know it’s not spread anywhere else.  Going for chemo first now too so no surgery tmw. Have a meeting with oncologist fri to find out the details.  The hair situation is still what’s giving me the most anxiety but I’m trying my best to get over it.  Thanks you all again x
